level.heading: Hearings.
level.text: Any administrative hearing held in accordance with this subchapter shall be held pursuant to Chapter 5 of Title 2, unless the Superintendent determines that a public proceeding would jeopardize or adversely affect the safety and soundness of the bank or the public interest. If the Superintendent makes the determination, the hearing may be held in private session.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 9-42, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 26-712.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Because of the codification of D.C. Law 11-142 as subchapter II of Chapter 8 [subchapter II of Chapter 7, 2001 Ed.], and the designation of the preexisting text as subchapter I, "subchapter" has been substituted for "chapter" in this section.
